justification: "Separating the features into pairs of two, we asked the participants to rank the four cells of possible combinations for each pair according to their perceived desirability."
"It used individual feature preferences elicited through a rank ordering task."

measured_by: Binary decision to install vs. not install each smartphone app
justification: "Participants decided whether they wanted to install a single app at a time and were repeatedly instructed to treat stimuli as independent."
